verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: signed] [ARG1: the “ Right to Try ” bill , which allows terminally ill patients to try unproven drugs without permission from the FDA] .
President Donald Trump signed the “ Right to [V: Try] ” bill , which allows terminally ill patients to try unproven drugs without permission from the FDA .
President Donald Trump signed [ARG0: the “ Right to Try ” bill] , [R-ARG0: which] [V: allows] [ARG1: terminally ill patients to try unproven drugs without permission from the FDA] .
President Donald Trump signed the “ Right to Try ” bill , which allows [ARG0: terminally ill patients] to [V: try] [ARG1: unproven drugs] [ARGM-MNR: without permission from the FDA] .
